Title: Clarifies certain provisions related to excess use or wear and tear of a vehicle leased for personal use for purposes of service contracts
Summary: Clarifies certain provisions related to excess use or wear and tear of a vehicle leased for personal use for purposes of service contracts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to clarifying certain provisions related to excess use or wear and tear of a vehicle leased for personal use for purposes of service contracts
